馲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuō］
［《廣韻》盧各切，入鐸，來。］
［《廣韻》他各切，入鐸，透。］
亦作“驝1”。
见“馲駝”。
[②]［zhé］
［《廣韻》陟格切，入陌，知。］
见“馲2”。

馲字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　馲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1434第10
【廣韻】【集韻】?陟格切，音磔。【玉篇】馲?，驢父牛母。【本草】牡驢交牛生者爲馲?。?或作?。【崔豹·古今注】驢牡馬牝則生?䳮，卽馲?也。　又【廣韻】盧落切【集韻】【韻會】歷各切，?音洛。【集韻】馲駝，畜名。或作?，亦作橐，通作駱。　又【集韻】闥各切，音託。又屋郭切，音雘。義?同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　馲; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1434 No. 10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zhi Geqi, Yin Yin. 【Jade articles】Dun?, donkey father and cow mother. [Materia Medica] The one who is born with a donkey and a cow is a 馲?. ?Or do?. [Cui Bao·Ancient and Modern Notes] Donkeys, stalls, horses, and horses are born with pi, and 卽馲 also.　[Guangyun] Lu Luoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] all the time,? Yinluo. [Ji Yun] camel, animal name. Or for?, also for licking, or for Luo.　 [Ji Yun] cut each other, sound support. Guoqie again, Yinyu. Righteous? Same.
